main.name: Jesus Medina
main.occupation: Fullstack ReactJS Developer with professional DevOps experience
main.description: I am also a practitioner of client and customer advocacy with experience maintaining modern, containerized applications for Fortune 500 companies. Shipped and open-sourced multiple applications for the civic betterment of Chicago.
main.bio: I’m an engineer who creates well organized and well written code mainly in Python + Javascript. I have recent experience working for a top digital product development agency in Chicago where I picked up many of the latest DevOps practices + tools and performed containerizations of applications using Docker for Fortune 500 clients, such as Tyson and Pfizer. I am experienced with MVC software architecture with direct practical experience in utilizing Django + Node for building APIs, React + React-Native for building UIs, and Mongo + Postgres for storing and querying data. I’ve also graduated Valedictorian from a Coding Dojo Bootcamp where I learned new technologies and improved my engineering skills.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you want to talk!

resume.skillmessage: Short write-up of my skills for employers

education.description: Attended the College of Liberal Arts and Sciences for one year.

work.title: React Developer
work.description: Designed and developed reusable utility functions and custom UI components using React. Worked with a Ruby on Rails API by implementing serializers to convert model instances to JSON. Coordinated with project managers, senior engineers, and designers.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Software Engineering Apprentice contributing to an agile team of developers, project managers, and designers. Contributed back-end architecture to a full stack PERN application for a non-profit in order to reduce their time processing user grant applications from 35-40 hrs/week down to 4-5 hrs/week.

work.title: DevOps Engineer
work.description: Utilized Docker for containerizing applications for startups/Fortune 500 companies, such as Tyson Foods and Pfizer Inc. Provisioned and deployed containers using Rancher Server. Assisted in provisioning staging and production environments on AWS. Performed over 20 application and database migrations for Tyson Foods by utilizing git version control and SQL. Developed an automated process for on-boarding new employees to company by developing a SlackBot for automating GSuite account creation. Applied Terraform scripts for automating the build of system infrastructure on AWS, and MUCH more

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Worked with stake holders at a Japanese based marketing company in order to develop a custom PHP based Wordpress application. Advised clients on best hosting services for Wordpress. Wrote production Node.js code for internal tools. Learned how to organize teams using agile methodology. Worked with other clients on developing a tool to help youth in Cook County expunge their records.

projects.title: Expunge.io
projects.category: Custom Wordpress Application to help youth expunge their records

projects.title: Django Search Engine
projects.category: Search Engine where citizens can search for any Chicago Police Officer and leave ratings on interactions

projects.title: Github Frontend Framework Dashboard
projects.category: View latest stats per framework so you can decide which one is best.

projects.title: Django Fitness App
projects.category: Django app where users can connect with trainers for personalized work-out plans/ meal-plans.
